SEARCH
Package com.g28.plager.Models

Class MenuModel

java.lang.Object
com.g28.plager.Models.MenuModel
Direct Known Subclasses:
FileModel
public class MenuModel extends Object
The menu model holds all the information about the files of the main screen, so they can be preprocessed and used in the main algorithm
